mapper.select: SELECT a.name, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.ADDRESS, a.INFO, a.LAT, a.LNG, r.CHECK_IN_TIME, r.CHECK_OUT_TIME, r.ROOM_NAME, r.STANDARD_OCCUPANCY, r.MAX_OCCUPANCY, MIN(br.BASIC_RATE) AS BASIC_RATE -- 기본 요금의 최소값을 선택 FROM ACCOMMODATION a JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO JOIN basic_rate br ON r.ROOM_NO = br.ROOM_NO WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = #{boardNo} GROUP BY a.name, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.ADDRESS,a.INFO, a.LAT, a.LNG, r.CHECK_IN_TIME, r.CHECK_OUT_TIME, r.ROOM_NAME, r.STANDARD_OCCUPANCY, r.MAX_OCCUPANCY
SELECT * FROM ACCOMMODATION a JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO join basic_rate br on br.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = #{boardNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r2.rating), 1), 0) AS avgRate FROM room r JOIN review r2 ON r.ROOM_NO = r2.ROOM_NO where r.ROOM_NO = #{RoomNo}

SELECT a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO, a.NAME, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.ADDRESS, r.CHECK_IN_TIME, MIN(br.BASIC_RATE) AS BASIC_RATE FROM accommodation a join room r on r.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO join basic_rate br on br.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO where a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO != #{boardNo} GROUP BY a.ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO, a.NAME, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.ADDRESS, r.CHECK_IN_TIME ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
select ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO , FACILITY_NAME from facilities f where ACCOMMODATION_ADMIN_NO = #{boardNo}
